text: Ara tamra nidarsanabalira madhye rayeche ye, tini tomadera jan'ya tomadera madhya theke srsti karechena tomadera jora[1]; yate tomara tadera kache santi pa'o [2] ebam srjana karechena tomadera madhye bhalabasa o sahamarmita. Niscaya ete bahu nidarsana rayeche se sampradayera jan'ya, yara cinta kare
